article.title: SAIC to Support U.S. Army Research and Development in Multiple Countries
article.text: SAIC, McLean, Virginia, was awarded a $45,210,663 modification (003803) to foreign military sales contract W31P4Q-05-A-0031 (Afghanistan, Australia, Bahrain, Central African Republic, Chad, Djibouti, Dominican Republic, Egypt, France, Georgia, Germany) for systems and computer resources support for the Army Research, Development, and Engineering Command. Work will be performed at Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, with an estimated completion date of February 20, 2017. Fiscal 2015 research, development, testing and evaluation, other procurement (Army) and other procurement funds in the amount of $45,210,663.40 were obligated at the time of the award. The Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting authority.?Â
